message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $200?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $200 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $120.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to consider your offer. For the premium product, I propose a price of $150.
